DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Self-Management Approach Improve Health Outcomes AML
DOC.detailed_description: Guided information-motivation-behavioral skill model use quasi-experimental cohort control research design , primary aim study : Determine feasibility biobehavioral self management approach ( BSMA ) program involve physical activity ( PA ) patient receive consolidation treatment AML . The primary feasibility outcomes aim rate recruitment , refusal , retention attrition ; addition investigator test method procedure prescribe BSMA PA program , include assess adherence , participant acceptance perceive benefit .
